title: Where can I make suggestions?
body: Is it possible to make suggestions here or is there an specific board for it?

replies.body: Depends on the suggestion really. If it's gameplay related, that'd be Gameplay of course. Anything about champion design would be most appropriate there as well. If it's something related to, say, hextech or the honor system? That would be most appropriate in Client Discussion.
Could you tell me where I should write a question about the Summoner's Code?
Ahhhh that'd most likely fit under General Discussion.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sx0xYZnV,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-10-09T21:24:48.549+0000)
>
> Ahhhh that'd most likely fit under General Discussion.

Thank you. :)

But I wrote allready a thread under General Discussion and I didn't geht an answer from Riot since 3 weeks (and since 16 weeks in der German EUW-board).

Do you know an alternative where I could get the answer of my question about the Summoner's Code?
(and no: the player support isn't an alternative because they wrote that they don't know the answer of my question and they aren't responsible for Summoner's Code topics)
Where should I write a question about the Summoner's Code? (If I really want to become the answer of my question)

Actually to make a suggestion all you have to do is to submit the suggestion onto the forum page. Riot does read your forums.

Here is the forum for concepts/ideas
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts

Here is where I found the link ^^^ (On "Got an awesome idea?")
https://www.riotgames.com/contact

For what it's worth, making suggestions goes against the terms of use. It isn't as if doing so is a violation but Riot requests that you don't make any suggestions. I'm just pointing it out since you received a red answer directing you to where might be the best place to submit a suggestion which seems a bit... I dunno, just a bit odd. 

"4.5. Can I submit ideas for improving the Game to Riot? (Please don’t. If you do anyways, we’ll have the absolute right to use it forever.)
